author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: Govt Teachers Jobs 2017, School Teacher Jobs (100 Vacancies Opening)
text:
Teachers Jobs for Primary / Secondary / High Secondary Government Schools Recruitment Vacancies   Most of the State Government Education Board conducting mandatory entrance examination of Teacher Eligibility Test (TET) for recruiting qualified Teachers in Government / Govt Aided schools from Class 1 to Class 8. Teaching jobs 2016-17 in government schools from 1st Standard to 12th Standard listed on the following Table. 
 : Diploma in Education / B.Ed (Bachelor of Education) / M.Ed (Master of Education).
